1.q_string: Light wave travelling in air along x-direction is given by \(E_y=540 \sin \pi \times 10^4(x-c t) \mathrm{Vm}^{-1}\). Then, the peak value of magnetic field of wave will be (Given c=3×108 ms−1 ) [25-Jul-2022]

A plane electromagnetic wave travels in a medium of relative permeability 1.61 and relative permittivity 6.44 . If magnitude of magnetic intensity is \(4.5 \times 10^{-2} \mathrm{Am}^{-1}\) at a point, what will be the approximate magnitude of electric field intensity at that point?

(Given : Permeability of free space \(\mu_0=4 \pi \times 10^{-7} \mathrm{NA}^{-2}\), speed of light in vacuum \(\mathrm{c}=3 \times 10^8 \mathrm{~ms}^{-} 1\) ) [24-Jun-2022]

The intensity of the light from a bulb incident on a surface is \(0.22 \mathrm{~W} / \mathrm{m}^2\). The amplitude of the magnetic field in this light-wave is \(\times 10^{-9} \mathrm{~T}\)

The magnetic field vector of an electromagnetic wave is given by \(\mathrm{B}=\mathrm{B}_0 \frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}}{\sqrt{2}} \cos (k z-\omega t) \mathrm{T}\) where \(\hat{i}, \hat{j}\) represents unit vector along \(\mathrm{X}\) and \(\mathrm{Y}\)-axis respectively. At \(t=0\), two electric charges \(q_1\) of \(4 \pi \mathrm{C}\) and \(q_2\) of \(2 \pi \mathrm{C}\) located at \(\left(0,0, \frac{\pi}{k}\right)\) and \(\left(0,0, \frac{3 \pi}{k}\right)\) respectively, have the same velocity of \(0.5 \hat{c} \hat{i}\).

(where, \(\mathrm{c}\) is the velocity of light). The ratio of the force acting on charge \(q_1\) to \(q_2\) is. [31 Aug 2021]

Seawater at a frequency \(f=9 \times 10^2 \mathrm{~Hz}\), has permittivity \(\varepsilon=80 \varepsilon_0\) and resistivity \(r=0.25 \Omega-m\). Imagine a parallel plate capacitor is immersed in seawater and is driven by an alternating voltage source \(V(t)=V_0 \sin (2 \pi f t)\). Then, the conduction current density becomes \(10^x\) times the displacement current density after time \(t=\frac{1}{800} \mathrm{~s}\). The value of \(x\) is..............

Take , \(\left.\frac{1}{4 \pi \varepsilon_0}=9 \times 10^9 N-m^2 C^{-2}\right)\) [17 Mar 2021]

The efficiency of the bulb is \(1.25 \%\). The value of peak electric field at \(P\) is \(x \times 10^{-1}\) \(\mathrm{V} / \mathrm{m}\).
